intro.description: Welcome to the Layered Diagram tutorial. It will help you get started using Architexa's layered diagram editor. Let's get started!

item.title: Opening a Layered Diagram
item.description:
1. In the package explorer, right click on your project.
2. Mouse over the Open In Diagram menu and select Layered Diagram.
3. In the Layered Diagram that opens, double click a package. (Large packages may take a few moments to open).
4. The packages at the bottom of the diagram depend on those above.
5. Mouse over some packages and classes, and notice how dependency lines appear

item.title: Exploring the Diagram
item.description:
1. Click on a package or class.
2. Click on one of the arrow buttons. (If no arrows appear on your selected class/package, it has no dependers or dependees, so select a different one).
3. After clicking the arrow, select one of the dependers/dependees from the menu that appears.
-> Notice how the dependency fits into the larger picture of your codebase.
